name: #1hgj | Keyboard Defender
description:
This game is my contribution to the 133th one hour game jam!

You are the general of the green keyboard base and have to defend the teritory from the filthy red ones. But you are totaly free to let them kill you as well. I mean its just a game do whatever you want.

The controls are quite simple press a key and the arcording minefid on the keybord will explode. At least think that it will explode this game was made in one hour and therefore the explosion is only a red sprite.
